title: Would you be mad if someone played Jinx in toplane?
body:
for all of the 8.11 apologist that say ~insert Gillbert Gottfried voice here~ "marksmen can be played anywhere bro" "not only marksmen in botlane bro" "diversity bro"
well if that's that case, then would you be upset if classic ADC/Marksmen mains played our crit marksmen toplane?
take Caitlyn, Jinx, etc top?
would that be cool?
or would we be trolling, and inting, and feeding?

replies.body:
Jinx top is a shit pick, even if you do well in lane, come time to team fight, the enemy Malphite is going to be a hell of a lot more useful than you. We already have a ranged DPS hypercarry in bot lane. We don't need two. We need some kind of utility, engage or splitter.

I don't mind off meta stuff but Jinx top makes zero sense. Literally troll.
Not gonna lie I would be a little iffy and would dodge that queue. I don’t know if that person is gonna be godlike and I’m not godlike so it’s quite the gamble.

I've actually went against a Jinx top lane before as Riven. The only time I could even kill her was if I had flash because I had to use all my damage to get on top of her otherwise. It was extremely unfun to play against.

I've also played Caitlyn and AP Tristana top. Caitlyn is really hard to get to as well.

why would it be trolling? if they are trying to win then im cool with it.

not everyone if a meta sheep.
